channel.title: I need a code for anti mass
channel.description: Ok, im coding a server, but it has no anti mass, which is a BIG problem because of thieving, well I am looking for a code that is somone clicks more that 2-3 times in a second it sends a message saying, "Please wait longer before clicking."

item.title: I need a code for anti mass
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Ive seen that on a server before, but it was messed up, I just want something so that if you mass clikc, lets say a cage for xp, and you click 10 times in one second it will only do the action once, not all 10 times.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2007, 12:07:00 AM[/size][hr]btw adam, thats fucking pointless

Read full topic
item.source: I need a code for anti mass

item.title: I need a code for anti mass
item.dc:creator: @0087adam 0087adam
item.description:
@0087adam wrote:

lol good luck

i do know one code though

open client.java

type ctrl-f

paste this in the text box

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

go exactly one line above it, at the end of the string press enter

the paste this there:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Save.
Compile.
Run.

btw, where it says

playerRights >= 1

tats for mods and admins

playerRights >= 0

Everyone

playerRights >= 2

thats for admins only

change that to them for the specified results

Read full topic
